name: Office Quest (Peter)
description:
My first game. A tribute to my former coworkers. 

It was written some years ago when I retired. I am not an artist so the graphics are primitive sketches and copyed images. You will recognize some from 'Chaos in the Cannibal Village' from Visionaire Adventure Contest 2015.

Some 'computer-screens' are still shown in danish only.

All the characters are living persons :-) 

Have fun.
